title: Pear and Pecan Bread
ingredients: ['250ml vegetable oil', '400g granulated sugar', '3 eggs', '410g pears, peeled, cored and chopped', '110g chopped pecans', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '375g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
